p.k: The huge tree in the park is set to be cut down to make room for a new parking lot. Lola is outraged. They can't do this! Itâ€™s our special tree! With Victor's help Lola decides to protest against the plan while Pat forms an alliance with Tank and the Guanos to save the tree. But they have to use all their ingeniousness to outsmart the work-proud construction worker.
